name: Heart's Desire: Blue Sea
description:
Heart's Desire: Blue Sea is a micro-tactics game made with Löve for LOW REZ JAM 2017.

Clean up the ocean by doing battle with different forms of pollution. Somebody's got to protect Mother Nature from the humans!

💙

Controls: 

  • WASD or arrow keys: move or attack (or select option on title screen)
    • Cost: 1 AP
  • Space or Enter: perform a special attack (or confirm menu selection)
    • Cost: 1 AP & 1 SP
  • V to adjust volume
  • Note that if you are defeated, you can Continue from the same level! Don't give up! Just don't close the window.

💙

Please let me know if you like this game, because I may release an improved version of it in the future. Possible additions:

  • Power-ups & character growth
  • Additional and/or more interesting enemies
  • Multiple modes
  • More-readable text & other graphical improvements

Comments & criticism are also welcome, as well as bug reports if you find any. Thank you for playing!
